attributes.action: Reduce the number of Mosques being built in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Dear People. I am in no way condoning hate crimes but I think that the amount of Mosques being built is just getting too much. Please remember we are a not an Islamic Country and people should not have to go everywhere and see so many Mosques all over the UK. All that I ask is that you take into consideration that some people are exposed to Islam way too much. I intend to make light of this issue and only ask that you let people breath.
